questionText: What is the main purpose of asset tokenization?

answerOptions.answerText: To represent real-world assets as digital tokens on the blockchain.
To increase the value of real-world assets.
To convert digital tokens into real-world assets.
To trade only cryptocurrencies on the blockchain.

questionText: Which type of asset can be tokenized on the blockchain?

answerOptions.answerText: Only physical assets like real estate.

questionText: What key benefit does tokenization bring to asset ownership?

answerOptions.answerText: Makes ownership fractional and easily tradable.
Reduces the need for legal documentation.
Allows the asset to be destroyed.

questionText: How does blockchain ensure the security of tokenized assets?

answerOptions.answerText: By centralizing control over the assets.
By using cryptography and decentralized verification.
By allowing only selected users to trade assets.
By relying on intermediaries to validate transactions.
